did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Book of Memories of the University of Arizona Faculty Women's Club 1930-1987

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Faculty Women's Club.

did.abstract: Scrapbooks containing photographs, clippings, historical notes, records of activities, lists of officers and members. Includes photographs of the 1985 Centennial Quilt.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Book of Memories of the University of Arizona Faculty Women's Club (AZ 297). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into scrapbooks by date ranges.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Scrapbooks containing photographs, clippings, historical notes, records of activities, lists of officers and members. Includes photographs of the 1985 Centennial Quilt.

dsc.head: Container List
dsc.p: This collection is organized into scrapbooks by date ranges.
